decision_conditions: The proposed outbuilding, by virtue of its height, design, form and bulk, would appear visually intrusive, incongruous, overly dominant and out of keeping with the character of the surrounding area of which it forms part, contrary to Section 12 of the National Planning Policy Framework (2024), Policies D3, of the London Plan (2021), CP30 of the Enfield Core Strategy (2010), DMD8, DMD12 and DMD37 of the Enfield Development Management Document (2014).

The proposed outbuilding, by virtue of its height, detailed design, form and bulk and proposed fenestration would prejudice the privacy enjoyed by the occupants of Nos 26 and 30 Mayfield Crescent, and present a development that is overbearing and unneighbourly towards the surrounding properties, contrary to Policies D3 of the London Plan and DMD8 and DMD12 of the Enfield Development Management Document (2014).
description: Detached rear outbuilding with a crown roof, habitable roofspace, dormer and side rooflights to be used as an annexe.
